environment.vehicle_manager Module

class environment.vehicle_manager.VehicleManager(num_of_vehicles, edge_position, sumo, out_dict, index_dict, config)

Bases: object

Manages the creation and management of vehicles in the simulation.

num_of_vehicles

Number of vehicles to create.

Type:

int

edge_position

Dictionary of edge positions.

Type:

dict

sumo

SUMO simulation instance.

out_dict

Dictionary of outgoing edges.

Type:

dict

index_dict

Dictionary of edge indices.

Type:

dict

config

Configuration dictionary.

Type:

dict

disability_categories

List of disability categories.

Type:

list

__init__(num_of_vehicles, edge_position, sumo, out_dict, index_dict, config)

Initialize the VehicleManager with the given parameters.

Parameters:

  • num_of_vehicles (int) – Number of vehicles to create.

  • edge_position (dict) – Dictionary of edge positions.

  • sumo – SUMO simulation instance.

  • out_dict (dict) – Dictionary of outgoing edges.

  • index_dict (dict) – Dictionary of edge indices.

  • config (dict) – Configuration dictionary.

create_vehicles()

Creates vehicles for the simulation.

Returns:

List of created Vehicle instances.

Return type:

list
